description: Demolition of existing debilitated garage/ lean-to structure and erection of single-storey side extension with front and rear access.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development hereby approved, shall only be used for a purpose ancillary or incidental or both to the residential use of Gatesgarth, 3 Albion Road, Kingston Upon Thames KT2 7BZ, unless otherwise first agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: the establishment of an additional independent unit of accommodation would give rise to an over-intensive use of the site and lead to an unsatisfactory relationship between independent dwellings in conflict with policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
